name: Squid House Premium
description:
Squid Game on a new approach, where following basic rules won’t get you winning. This approach consists of mixing basic Squid Game rules with puzzles and tricks.

Squid House is a platform that allows you to play a tricky Squid Game inside a house full of tricks and puzzles and win a money bag. During the game, you will interact with many objects and items that you can use to solve the puzzles.

Once you finished a level, you will be transformed to the next level (next room of the house), where you be with a new puzzle.
